text: Lyda Krewson (born November 14, 1953Twitter: Mayor Lyda Krewson) is an American Democratic politician. She was the 46th Mayor of St. Louis, Missouri from 2017 until 2021.Krewson cruises to a historic victory in St. Louis to win mayor's office From 1997 and 2017, she was the alderman of St. Louis's 28th ward.About Lyda Krewson She was the first female mayor of St. Louis. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of St. Louis Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:People from Davenport, Iowa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Lyda Krewson
